original: @156b # // rgya gar skad du /

analyzed: sa manta gu na sa li n'i n'a ma t'i k'a /
translated: Samantagu·πáƒÅlaya-nƒÅma-tƒ´kƒÅ

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: yon tan ma lus pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa //
analyzed: yon tan ma lus pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa //

original: dpal bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Cakrasa·πÉvara.üîΩHaving bowed to the protector Cakrasa·πÉvara,

original: 'khor lo gsum sogs ldan pa yi //üîΩbde mchog mgon la rab btud nas //
analyzed: 'khor lo gsum sogs ldan pa yi // bde mchog mgon la rab btud nas //
translated: endowed with the three wheels and so forth,

original: bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis //
translated: through the kindness of the guru's feet,

original: de yi rnam 'grel brjod par bya //
analyzed: de yi rnam 'grel brjod par bya //
translated: his commentary will be expressed here.

original: shes pa'i nga rgyal dag kyang med //
analyzed: shes pa'i nga rgyal dag kyang med //
translated: There is also no pride in knowledge.

original: kha cig don du byas pa min //
analyzed: kha cig don du byas pa min //
translated: Some are not done for the sake of meaning.

original: sna tshogs 'dod dang mthun pa ru //
analyzed: sna tshogs 'dod dang mthun pa ru //
translated: In accordance with various desires,

original: bdag nyid dran pa nyid phyir ro //üîΩmchog tu dga' ba skyed byed pa'i //
analyzed: bdag nyid dran pa nyid phyir ro // mchog tu dga' ba skyed byed pa'i //
translated: it is for the sake of one's own mindfulness.

original: dam pa'i rang bzhin gsang ba ni //
analyzed: dam pa'i rang bzhin gsang ba ni //
translated: The secret nature that produces supreme joy,

original: mdor bsdus gdan las byung gyur pa //
analyzed: mdor bsdus gdan las byung gyur pa //
translated: arisen from the seat summarized here,

original: de 'dir the tshom med pa'o //
analyzed: de 'dir the tshom med pa'o //
translated: is undoubtedly this.

original: de la dang po brjod bya dang rjod byed dang / dgos pa dang / dgos pa'i dgos pa rnams mthong na rtog pa dang ldan pa chos kyi rjes su 'brang pa yang 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la dang po brjod bya dang rjod byed dang / dgos pa dang / dgos pa'i dgos pa rnams mthong na rtog pa dang ldan pa chos kyi rjes su 'brang pa yang 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one sees the subject matter, the expression, the purpose, and the purpose of the purpose, then one who is endowed with understanding, who is a follower of the Dharma, will engage in it.

original: de'i phyir brjod bya dang rjod byed dang 'brel pa dang / dgos pa dang dgos pa'i dgos pa bstan pas dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / rtog pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa po'i gang zag 'jug pa'i yan lag tu de nyid 'dir brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir brjod bya dang rjod byed dang 'brel pa dang / dgos pa dang dgos pa'i dgos pa bstan pas dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / rtog pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa po'i gang zag 'jug pa'i yan lag tu de nyid 'dir brjod par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, in order to engage the person who is a follower of faith and the person who is endowed with understanding and is an initiator, by teaching the connection between the subject matter and the expression, the purpose, and the purpose of the purpose, that very [tantra] should be explained here.

original: de nas de phyir zhes pa nas bzung ste ci snyed dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i rgyud le'u lnga bcu gcig pa'i bar gyi gzhung gi tshig ni rjod byed do //
analyzed: de nas de phyir zhes pa nas bzung ste ci snyed dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i rgyud le'u lnga bcu gcig pa'i bar gyi gzhung gi tshig ni rjod byed do //
translated: The words of the text beginning with then, after that up to the fifty-one chapters of the glorious Cakrasa·πÉvara Tantra are the expression.

original: gang des brjod bya dpal he ru ka dang rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa ma lus pa'i ngo bo nyid ni brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang des brjod bya dpal he ru ka dang rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa ma lus pa'i ngo bo nyid ni brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: The nature of the subject matter, the glorious Heruka, VajravƒÅrƒÅhƒ´, and so forth, is what is to be expressed.

original: 'dis ni brjod bya dang rjod byed bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dang / thabs dang thabs las byung ba dang tshig dang tshig ni don dang bskyed bya dang skyed byed dang rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni brjod bya dang rjod byed bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dang / thabs dang thabs las byung ba dang tshig dang tshig ni don dang bskyed bya dang skyed byed dang rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni 'brel pa'o //
translated: This is the definition of the relation as the nature of the expressed and the expresser, the probandum and the probans, the means and the end, the word and the meaning, the produced and the producer, the cause and the effect, and so on.

original: dpal he ru ka dang rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bde ba chen po'i ye shes dngos su skyed par byed pa dang 'dod chags @157a * //üîΩla sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i skyon 'joms par byed pa ni dgos pa'o //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka dang rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bde ba chen po'i ye shes dngos su skyed par byed pa dang 'dod chags @157a * // la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i skyon 'joms par byed pa ni dgos pa'o //
translated: The purpose is the direct generation of the exalted wisdom of great bliss of the thirty-seven deities such as Sri Heruka and Vajravarahi and the destruction of the faults of the afflictions such as desire.

original: de yang 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i skyon bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas gsal te tshegs med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'gro bas bskyed nas sems can gyi don byed pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
analyzed: de yang 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i skyon bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas gsal te tshegs med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'gro bas bskyed nas sems can gyi don byed pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
translated: The ultimate purpose is that the faults of the afflictions such as desire are clarified by attaining the samadhi of great bliss and without difficulty the exalted wisdom of perfect buddhahood is generated by the migrating beings and the welfare of sentient beings is accomplished.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyud kyi tshogs skye 'gro gzhug par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i bar ni dgos pa yin no zhes kha cig gi'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyud kyi tshogs skye 'gro gzhug par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i bar ni dgos pa yin no zhes kha cig gi'o //
translated: Some say: The purpose is the consecration of the secret, etc. up to the entry into the mandala, for the sake of introducing living beings into the collection of the Tantra of the Bhagavat.

original: phyis kyi dus su de'i 'bras bu thob pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
analyzed: phyis kyi dus su de'i 'bras bu thob pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
translated: The ultimate purpose is the attainment of the result later.

original: de yang nges par brjod pa ni bstan bcos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i skyes bu la bstan na nye bar mkho ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang nges par brjod pa ni bstan bcos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i skyes bu la bstan na nye bar mkho ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, the statement is for the sake of the necessity of teaching the person who follows the treatise.

original: 'dir ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkha' 'gro dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas ston pa po ni bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das mas rtogs par bya ba ni kha cig zer ro //
analyzed: 'dir ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkha' 'gro dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas ston pa po ni bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das mas rtogs par bya ba ni kha cig zer ro //
translated: Here, some say: The teacher is the Bhagavat surrounded by the retinue of the dakas and dakinis of all the Buddhas. The object of understanding is the Bhagavati.

original: gnyis ka yang mgrin gcig gi gsung gis ston pa po bcom ldan 'das ston pa mo bcom ldan 'das mas sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma dpa' bo dang dpa' mos rtogs par bya ba ni kha cig gi'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka yang mgrin gcig gi gsung gis ston pa po bcom ldan 'das ston pa mo bcom ldan 'das mas sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma dpa' bo dang dpa' mos rtogs par bya ba ni kha cig gi'o //
translated: Both of them, with a single voice, are the teacher, the Blessed Lady, the Blessed One, the one to be realized by the heroes and heroines, the dakas and dakinis, of some.

original: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i 'khor gyis bskor nas ston pa po bcom ldan 'das ma bcom ldan 'das kyis rtogs par bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i 'khor gyis bskor nas ston pa po bcom ldan 'das ma bcom ldan 'das kyis rtogs par bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
translated: The Blessed One, the teacher, the Blessed Lady, surrounded by the retinue of the dakas and dakinis, the heroes and heroines, is the one to be realized by others.

original: de nyid kyi phyir //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir //
translated: For that very reason,

original: mchod bzhi de bzhin rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: mchod bzhi de bzhin rnal 'byor ma //
translated: the yoginis are the four offerings.

original: zhes gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is said,

original: dpal he ru ka la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams la de bzhin du bos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams la de bzhin du bos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and because the yoginis, the dakinis, the heroes, Heruka and so forth, are addressed in the same way.

original: de nas de phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dir rgyud kyi dang po nyid du 'di skad bdag gis thos zhes bya ba la sogs pa sdud pa pos ci'i phyir bsam par ma byas zhes kha cig rtsod pa la //
analyzed: de nas de phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dir rgyud kyi dang po nyid du 'di skad bdag gis thos zhes bya ba la sogs pa sdud pa pos ci'i phyir bsam par ma byas zhes kha cig rtsod pa la //
translated: Here, why did the compiler not think, ‚ÄúAt the very beginning of the tantra, I will say ‚ÄòThus have I heard‚Äô and so forth?‚Äù

original: de yongs su spangs pa'i phyir brjod pa ni bcom ldan 'das mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa rab tu bstan pa'i don du ste /
analyzed: de yongs su spangs pa'i phyir brjod pa ni bcom ldan 'das mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa rab tu bstan pa'i don du ste /
translated: To completely abandon that, it is said that the BhagavƒÅn taught nonabiding nirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: 'di nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
translated: he always abides in the nature of all.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: gzhan ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud stong phrag brgya pa las btus pa nyid kyi phyir de la nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud de nyid kyi dang por 'di skad bdag gis la sogs pa bstan pas rgyud phyi ma 'dir ma bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud stong phrag brgya pa las btus pa nyid kyi phyir de la nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud de nyid kyi dang por 'di skad bdag gis la sogs pa bstan pas rgyud phyi ma 'dir ma bstan pa yin no //
translated: Since the other is extracted from the Tantra Equal to Space in One Hundred Thousand Sections, at the beginning of that very Tantra Equal to Space, ‚ÄúThus have I heard‚Äù and so forth are taught, and therefore it is not taught in this later Tantra.

original: de'i phyir rgyud gzhan du /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyud gzhan du /
translated: Therefore, in another Tantra,

original: @157b mi gsal don ston tshig ni phyi ma yin //
analyzed: @157b mi gsal don ston tshig ni phyi ma yin //
translated: the later words teach the meaning that is not clear.

original: zhes bya'o // gzhan ni chos kyi de kho na nyid bstan du med pas bstan bya dang ston pa po gcig nyid du bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // gzhan ni chos kyi de kho na nyid bstan du med pas bstan bya dang ston pa po gcig nyid du bstan pa yin te /
translated: Another, because the reality of the Dharma is not taught, is taught as the identity of the taught and the teacher.

original: sngags dang sku ni bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: sngags dang sku ni bcom ldan 'das //
translated: The mantra and the body are the Bhagavat.

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi phrad kyi tshogs 'dis rgyud phyi ma nyid du nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi phrad kyi tshogs 'dis rgyud phyi ma nyid du nges pa yin no //
translated: Then, etc. This collection of words ascertains the later tantra.

original: de nas ni rjes thogs te nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud de'i rjes thogs su 'og nas 'byung ba 'di'i don brjod pa ni de gsal por bshad par bya'o zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nas ni rjes thogs te nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud de'i rjes thogs su 'og nas 'byung ba 'di'i don brjod pa ni de gsal por bshad par bya'o zhes sbyar ro //
translated: Then, immediately after, the tantra equal to space, immediately after that tantra, the meaning of what follows will be expressed. That will be clearly explained.

original: brjod bzhin pa'i de nas kyi sgra ni rim pa'am rgyu'i don to //
analyzed: brjod bzhin pa'i de nas kyi sgra ni rim pa'am rgyu'i don to //
translated: The word then in the expression being expressed has the meaning of sequence or cause.

original: yang na de nas kyi sgra'i tshig ni bkra shis pa'i don te /
analyzed: yang na de nas kyi sgra'i tshig ni bkra shis pa'i don te /
translated: Or, the word then has the meaning of auspiciousness.

original: bstan bcos dang por bkra shis brjod pa ni 'jug pa po rnams bgegs med pa'i don yin pa'am yang na dbang du bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bstan bcos dang por bkra shis brjod pa ni 'jug pa po rnams bgegs med pa'i don yin pa'am yang na dbang du bya ba'i don to //
translated: The auspicious expression at the beginning of the treatise is for the sake of the absence of obstacles for those who enter it, or else it has the meaning of subjugation.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sngon du bstan pa'i rang bzhin la ltos nas bkra shis pa'i don nam dbang du bya ba'i don du de nas kyi sgra brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sngon du bstan pa'i rang bzhin la ltos nas bkra shis pa'i don nam dbang du bya ba'i don du de nas kyi sgra brjod pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äúthen‚Äù is stated in the sense of auspiciousness or in the sense of control, in dependence on the nature taught previously.

original: de phyir gyi sgra ni bstan bcos su rim pa'am rgyu mtshan gyi don gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de phyir gyi sgra ni bstan bcos su rim pa'am rgyu mtshan gyi don gyi phyir ro //
translated: The word ‚Äútherefore‚Äù is for the purpose of sequence or reason in the treatise.

original: 'on kyang 'og nas byung ba'i tshig bzhis khyad par du byas pa'i he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'og nas byung ba'i tshig bzhis khyad par du byas pa'i he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor zhes gsungs te /
translated: However, the word ‚Äúunion‚Äù is stated in the sense of the special Heruka, who will be mentioned below with the four lines.

original: dpal gyi sgra ni bha ga'i tshig gam mchod pa'i tshig gam bsod nams sam ye shes kyi tshig gam gsang ba gsum gyi tshig go //
analyzed: dpal gyi sgra ni bha ga'i tshig gam mchod pa'i tshig gam bsod nams sam ye shes kyi tshig gam gsang ba gsum gyi tshig go //
translated: The word ‚Äúglory‚Äù is the word for bhaga, the word for worship, the word for merit and knowledge, or the word for the three secrets.

original: de nyid ye shes kyi phyag rgya rdo rje phag mo gtso bor gyur pa'i he ru ka ni he ru ka dpal lo //
analyzed: de nyid ye shes kyi phyag rgya rdo rje phag mo gtso bor gyur pa'i he ru ka ni he ru ka dpal lo //
translated: That very Heruka, who is the chief of the knowledge seal Vajravarahi, is the glory of Heruka.

original: de'i yang dag sbyor ba ni de dang lhan cig tu ro gcig pa'i ngo bor 'khyud pa dang 'o byed pa'i sbyor pa'i sbyar ba zhes pa ni kun rdzob kyi phyogs so //
analyzed: de'i yang dag sbyor ba ni de dang lhan cig tu ro gcig pa'i ngo bor 'khyud pa dang 'o byed pa'i sbyor pa'i sbyar ba zhes pa ni kun rdzob kyi phyogs so //
translated: His ‚Äúunion‚Äù is the union of the union of embracing and kissing in the nature of one taste with her. The word ‚Äúunion‚Äù is in the relative aspect.

original: gzhan yang he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor ni //
analyzed: gzhan yang he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor ni //
translated: Moreover, the union of the perfect, glorious Heruka,üîΩis nondual, signless,

original: gnyis med mtshan ma med pa dang // smin pa'i dngos po rnam par spangs //
analyzed: gnyis med mtshan ma med pa dang // smin pa'i dngos po rnam par spangs //
translated: and devoid of ripening things.

original: stong nyid mngon par 'du byed med //üîΩgnas med gnas pa med pa med //
analyzed: stong nyid mngon par 'du byed med // gnas med gnas pa med pa med //
translated: It is emptiness, unconditioned,üîΩwithout abode, without non-abode.

original: gnas med gnas pa med spangs rigs //
analyzed: gnas med gnas pa med spangs rigs //
translated: One should abandon abode and non-abode.

original: 'di nyid rnal 'byor gyur pa ste //
analyzed: 'di nyid rnal 'byor gyur pa ste //
translated: This itself is the state of yoga,

original: rnam bkod tshig la yang dag gnas //
analyzed: rnam bkod tshig la yang dag gnas //
translated: abiding in the perfect arrangement of words.

original: dpal ldan he ru ka brjod pas //
analyzed: dpal ldan he ru ka brjod pas //

original: brjod bya la ni the tshom med //
analyzed: brjod bya la ni the tshom med //
translated: there is no doubt about the object of expression.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo nyid //
translated: The essence of the great seal

original: rim pa ji bzhin de bzhin brjod //
analyzed: rim pa ji bzhin de bzhin brjod //
translated: is expressed just as it is, in stages.

original: ces bya ba ni don dam pa'i phyogs so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni don dam pa'i phyogs so //

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /

analyzed: gzhan gyi gdan ni shes rab ste //

analyzed: bdag gi gdan ni thabs bzhin no //

analyzed: rnal 'byor gdan du rnam par gnas //

original: de nyid gdan ni de las byung //
analyzed: de nyid gdan ni de las byung //

analyzed: gang zhig de rams spangs gyur pa'i //

analyzed: lhan cig skyes zhes bya ba ste // ngag gi spyod yul @158a * //

analyzed: gsang ba ni rtsa bar bya ba ste /

analyzed: ha ni khva gdong ma'i phyir dang / sa dang ya gnyis sbyar ba ni gnyis ka'i sa bon gyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ram //
translated: Ha is for KƒÅkƒÅsyƒÅ, and the combination of sa and ya is the nature of the seed of both,

original: rten dang brten pa nyid gcig gi ngo bo'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rten dang brten pa nyid gcig gi ngo bo'i phyir ro //

original: gsang ba'i sgras ni rdo rje dang padma dang byang chub kyi sems su bstan pa de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: gsang ba'i sgras ni rdo rje dang padma dang byang chub kyi sems su bstan pa de nyid kyi phyir /

original: thugs kyi rdo rje'i phyi rol ni //
analyzed: thugs kyi rdo rje'i phyi rol ni //

original: dbang po don gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dbang po don gyi rang bzhin no //

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /

original: thams cad kyi 'dod pa ni mngon par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad kyi 'dod pa ni mngon par 'dod pa ste /

original: de nyid ni don te dgos pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni don te dgos pa'o //

original: yang ji lta bu zhes pa la /
analyzed: yang ji lta bu zhes pa la /

original: phyi ma las kyang phyi ma ste //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
analyzed: phyi ma las kyang phyi ma ste // zhes gsungs te /

original: bstan bya dang ston pa po dbyer med pa la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: bstan bya dang ston pa po dbyer med pa la sogs pa ni /

analyzed: gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa bla ma'i rgyud de rnams las kyang de bla mar gyur pa nyid du bstan pa yin no //
translated: are taught in the guru tantras such as the Guhyasamaja, etc., as being the highest of the highest.

original: yang ci lta bur gyur pa zhes pa la /
analyzed: yang ci lta bur gyur pa zhes pa la /
translated: Again, what kind?

analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom // zhes gsungs te /

analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa la sogs pa thams cad do //

original: dra ba ni de'i cho gas so //
analyzed: dra ba ni de'i cho gas so //

analyzed: sdom pa ni de bsdams shing sbas so zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: mkha' la 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: mkha' la 'gro ba ste /

analyzed: dee las nam mkha' la 'gro ba ste /

original: da ni ldan pa'i don te /
analyzed: da ni ldan pa'i don te /

analyzed: mdor bsdus pa ste zhes gsungs te /

analyzed: mdor bsdus pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud rgyas pa las yang dag par bsdus zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: de nyid kyi don gsal bar bya ba'i phyir rgyas pa min zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: yang na mdor bsdus pa ma yin te ci'i phyir rgyas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes sbyar ro //

original: 'dir de'i bsam pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud ni gzhung rgyas la 'dir don rgyas pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'dir de'i bsam pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud ni gzhung rgyas la 'dir don rgyas pa nyid de /

original: khams gsum gyi bdag nyid 'khor lo gsum bshad pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khams gsum gyi bdag nyid 'khor lo gsum bshad pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: khams gsum gyi bdag nyid yin pas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka dpal yang dag par sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: khyad par du bya ba'i tshig go //

original: gsang ba ni de khyad par du byed pa ste /
analyzed: gsang ba ni de khyad par du byed pa ste /

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa //
translated: For that very reason, accomplisher of all desired aims,

original: phyi ma las kyang phyi ma ste //
analyzed: phyi ma las kyang phyi ma ste //
translated: is the word of the special act.üîΩ The Blessed One has spoken the word of the special act: the latter of the latter,

analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom // zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis khyad par du byed pa'i tshig gsungs so //

original: 'dis bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka gtso bo bdag nyid che ba bstan nas /üîΩdang por gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dis bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka gtso bo bdag nyid che ba bstan nas / dang por gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /

original: gsang ba zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: gsang ba zhes gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the perfect place, he says secret, etc.

original: gsang ba'i sgras ni 'khor lo gsum po la sogs la gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma shes par bya ste /
analyzed: gsang ba'i sgras ni 'khor lo gsum po la sogs la gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma shes par bya ste /
translated: The word secret should be understood as the dakini who resides in the three wheels, etc.üîΩ üîΩPlace is the place of the dakini.

original: de la gsang ba'i ngo bo nyid nyid ni gsang ba ste /
analyzed: de la gsang ba'i ngo bo nyid nyid ni gsang ba ste /

original: ro gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis nam mkha'i khams kun du song ba'i bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'i 'dir de'i gnas nyid do //
analyzed: ro gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis nam mkha'i khams kun du song ba'i bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'i 'dir de'i gnas nyid do //
translated: The essence of the one taste is the universal space of the sky, the glorious Heruka, the BhagavƒÅn, who is endowed with VajravƒÅrƒÅhƒ´ and so forth. Here, that is the abode.

original: mchog ni phul du byung ba ste /
analyzed: mchog ni phul du byung ba ste /
translated: Supreme is the best.

original: gtso bo gong na med pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi gzhi nyid kyi phyir 'dir de'i don to //
analyzed: gtso bo gong na med pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi gzhi nyid kyi phyir 'dir de'i don to //
translated: The supreme, unsurpassed, is the basis of mundane and supramundane gnosis. Here, that is the meaning.

original: yang ji lta bu zhes pa la /
analyzed: yang ji lta bu zhes pa la /
translated: Moreover, what is it like?

original: dgyes pa zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: dgyes pa zhes gsungs te /
translated: It is said to be ‚Äúdelightful.‚Äù

original: bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i rol pa'i thugs rjes dga' ba nyid kyi phyir dgyes pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i rol pa'i thugs rjes dga' ba nyid kyi phyir dgyes pa'o //

original: 'dir de ltar yang /
analyzed: 'dir de ltar yang /
translated: Here, it is also like this:

original: lha yi sku yi rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: lha yi sku yi rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: By the yoga of the deity‚Äôs form,

original: rang bzhin med pa'i don goms na //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i don goms na //

original: mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po ni //
analyzed: mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po ni //

original: sangs rgyas thams @159a * //üîΩcad rab sgrub pa'o //üîΩzhes gsungs so //

original: de ltar 'dir phyi'i mchod pa zhes bya ba med pas de'i med pa nyid kyang mtshon pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar 'dir phyi'i mchod pa zhes bya ba med pas de'i med pa nyid kyang mtshon pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, here there is no so-called external worship, and its non-existence is also not indicated.

original: yang ci lta bur gyur pa zhes pa la /
analyzed: yang ci lta bur gyur pa zhes pa la /
translated: Again, what kind of?

original: thams cad bdag nyid ces gsungs te /
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid ces gsungs te /
translated: It is said: all of it is one's own nature.

original: 'dis ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gzhan med par gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gzhan med par gsungs so //
translated: By this, it is said that there is no other perfect retinue.

original: thams cad bdag nyid ni khams gsum gyi bdag nyid 'khor lo la sogs pa la rnam par gnas pa'i bdag nyid ni phyi rol gyi bdag nyid dam nang gi bdag nyid du 'dir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid ni khams gsum gyi bdag nyid 'khor lo la sogs pa la rnam par gnas pa'i bdag nyid ni phyi rol gyi bdag nyid dam nang gi bdag nyid du 'dir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: All of it is one's own nature means that the nature of the three realms, abiding in the wheel and so forth, is one's own nature, either external or internal, here.

original: rtag tu gnas zhes pa ni rtag tu ni kha cig gam gang du yang rgyun chad pa med par bstan to //
analyzed: rtag tu gnas zhes pa ni rtag tu ni kha cig gam gang du yang rgyun chad pa med par bstan to //

original: gnas zhes bya ba ni khams gsum rnam par gnon pa gcig tu nyams pa med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gnas zhes bya ba ni khams gsum rnam par gnon pa gcig tu nyams pa med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Abiding should be understood as the nature of non-deficiency in the conquest of the three realms.

original: da ni brjod par bya ba phun sum tshogs pa ston te /
analyzed: da ni brjod par bya ba phun sum tshogs pa ston te /
translated: Now, the perfection of the subject matter is taught.

original: mkha' 'gro kun dngos zhes pa ni //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro kun dngos zhes pa ni //
translated: The reality of all dakinis

original: mkha' 'gro'i sgras ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro'i sgras ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /

original: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi rang bzhin zhes rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi rang bzhin zhes rtogs par bya ste /

original: rang bzhin la ma ya ta'i rkyen byin pas ro gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang bzhin la ma ya ta'i rkyen byin pas ro gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúhaving become one taste‚Äù is that the nature has the maya condition.

original: sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: sems dpa' ni /
translated: Hero means

original: sems can thams cad kyi don nus pa nyid kyi phyir ram brtson 'grus chen po phun sum tshogs pa nyid kyi phyir mchog tu bstan pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas sems dpa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don nus pa nyid kyi phyir ram brtson 'grus chen po phun sum tshogs pa nyid kyi phyir mchog tu bstan pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas sems dpa'o //
translated: that he is a hero because he has the qualities taught as supreme, due to being able to benefit all sentient beings or due to being endowed with perfect great diligence.üîΩVajrasattva means

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje ni dbyer med pa'i ye shes nyid kyi phyir ram sems can thams cad la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje ni dbyer med pa'i ye shes nyid kyi phyir ram sems can thams cad la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: that he is Vajrasattva because he is the indestructible gnosis itself or because he abides in all sentient beings.

original: seng ge dang 'phrog byed dang dbyig gi snying po la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi bskyod pa nyid kyi sems dpa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: seng ge dang 'phrog byed dang dbyig gi snying po la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi bskyod pa nyid kyi sems dpa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: He is Vajrasattva because he is a hero who is unshakable by all, such as lions, thieves, and Magadha.

original: shes rab dang thabs kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa la nye bar mkho ba nyid kyis mchog tu phul du byung ba nyid du brjod do //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa la nye bar mkho ba nyid kyis mchog tu phul du byung ba nyid du brjod do //
translated: Since it is the very essence of wisdom and means, it is said to be the most excellent, because it is the very thing needed for the perfection of the aims of others.

original: bla na med pa'i mchod par 'os pas mchog gi bde ba dang yid bde ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir bde ba ni bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i mchod par 'os pas mchog gi bde ba dang yid bde ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir bde ba ni bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
translated: Since it is the most excellent bliss and mental bliss by nature, it is bliss, the Blessed One himself.

original: bde ba'i sgra sgrub pa ni ma ning gi rtags yin no //
analyzed: bde ba'i sgra sgrub pa ni ma ning gi rtags yin no //
translated: The affix ana is a neuter affix.

original: 'dis thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi tshig la sogs pa rang gi don dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par brjod do //
analyzed: 'dis thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi tshig la sogs pa rang gi don dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par brjod do //
translated: By this, he describes the perfection of one's own and others' aims, etc., which are the words of the nature of all.

original: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na thams cad kyi @159b bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' bde ba mchog la rtag tu gnas so zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na thams cad kyi @159b bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' bde ba mchog la rtag tu gnas so zhes sbyar ro //
translated: In the supreme secret, the abode of bliss, the Blessed One, the nature of all, Vajrasattva, the hero who is the nature of all dakinis, always abides in supreme bliss.

original: yang na khams dang phyag rgya dang 'bras bu bsdus pa'i yan lag rnam par thar pa dang dga' ba dang skad cig dbang la sogs pa ru rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' mchog tu bde bas rtag tu bzhugs so zhes sbyar
analyzed: yang na khams dang phyag rgya dang 'bras bu bsdus pa'i yan lag rnam par thar pa dang dga' ba dang skad cig dbang la sogs pa ru rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' mchog tu bde bas rtag tu bzhugs so zhes sbyar
translated: Or else, the Blessed One Vajrasattva always abides as the supreme being, with the bliss of being the nature of all dakinis, in the branches that are included in the elements, seals, and results, such as liberation, joy, and the instant of power, and so on.

original: ro // ci lha gzhan khyad par can byed pa yin nam zhes dogs pa spang bar bya ba'i don du 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ro // ci lha gzhan khyad par can byed pa yin nam zhes dogs pa spang bar bya ba'i don du 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: 'di ni nges par gzung ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni nges par gzung ba'o //
translated: This is a specification.

original: rang byung ni bcom ldan 'das rang nyid de gzhan las byung ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang byung ni bcom ldan 'das rang nyid de gzhan las byung ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: de ltar yang /üîΩsems can kun la gang gi sems //
analyzed: de ltar yang / sems can kun la gang gi sems //
translated: Thus, it is said:üîΩBecause his mindüîΩis stable in all sentient beings,

analyzed: brtan pa'i phyir na sems par brjod // bsam gtan la ni yi dam gyis //

original: brtan par gyur pas rdo rje'o //
analyzed: brtan par gyur pas rdo rje'o //
translated: in meditative concentration, he is the vajra.üîΩOr else, he is Vajrasattva

original: sems dpa'i byin rlabs sbyor ba yis //üîΩyang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'gyur //
analyzed: sems dpa'i byin rlabs sbyor ba yis //üîΩyang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'gyur //

analyzed: de yang kha cig gang yang ma byas pas na rang byung du brjod do //
translated: Some say: It is called self-arisen because it is not made by anyone.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni skal pa phun sum tshogs pa nyid kyi phyir ram /
translated: The Blessed One is called Blessed because he is endowed with good fortune,

translated: or because he has conquered all afflictions.üîΩHe is also called Blessed because he is endowed with the six:

analyzed: 'di la de yod pas bcom ldan no //

analyzed: shes rab thabs dang bcom ldan no //

original: thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas //

translated: The intention here is that the master, the yogin, the yoginis, the heroes and heroines, etc., abiding in the three wheels, are found in the three worlds, other than the glorious Cakrasa·πÉvara, the chief of the wheel, who is found by suffering.

translated: The term pledge means the class of things to be protected,

analyzed: te / kha cig tu bzhad gang du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because in some cases it becomes laughter.

original: shin tu mnyam gzhag sgrub pa pos //
analyzed: shin tu mnyam gzhag sgrub pa pos //
translated: The practitioner who is well equipoised

original: zhes pa ni thams cad du sngags dang lha la goms pa'i yid kyis sgrub pa po rnal 'byor pas bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni thams cad du sngags dang lha la goms pa'i yid kyis sgrub pa po rnal 'byor pas bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that the yogƒ´, the practitioner, should meditate everywhere with a mind familiar with mantra and deity.

original: dam tshig nyams pas dkyil 'khor dang / dbang bskur dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //
analyzed: dam tshig nyams pas dkyil 'khor dang / dbang bskur dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //
translated: One who has violated the commitments will not attain the ma·πá·∏çala, empowerment, or siddhi.

original: zhes pa ni dam tshig las kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa ma lus pa'i yul la gang gi phyir de rnams rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor mas sngags dang dkyil 'khor 'khor la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid tsam yang gzhan la yang rig par miüîΩbya'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dam tshig las kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa ma lus pa'i yul la gang gi phyir de rnams rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor mas sngags dang dkyil 'khor 'khor la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid tsam yang gzhan la yang rig par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This means that the yogƒ´ and yoginƒ´ should not reveal to others even the mere nature of the characteristics of the ma·πá·∏çala, ma·πá·∏çala wheel, and so on, in the domain of the commitments, action seal, and so on, in their entirety.

original: yang na de dang 'brel pa'i dam tshig sgrub pa pos de yang rig par byas na dngos grub kun du mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang na de dang 'brel pa'i dam tshig sgrub pa pos de yang rig par byas na dngos grub kun du mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Or else, if the practitioner who is connected with that reveals the commitments, it has the meaning of ‚Äúall siddhis will not occur.‚Äù

original: da ni bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga ston te /
analyzed: da ni bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga ston te /
translated: Now, the five kinds of nectar are taught.

original: sbrang rtsi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sbrang rtsi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Honey, and so on, is stated.

original: sbrang rtsi ni ga pur /
analyzed: sbrang rtsi ni ga pur /
translated: Honey is nutmeg.

original: dmar ni rang byung gi me tog go //
analyzed: dmar ni rang byung gi me tog go //
translated: Red is the naturally arisen flower.

original: ga pur dang bcas pa ni s'a li dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: ga pur dang bcas pa ni s'a li dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Together with camphor is together with sƒÅli.

original: yang khrag dang / gla rtsi dang / tsandan ni bzhi mnyam dang / dmar ni tsandan dang / tsandan dmar po dang yang sbyar ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang khrag dang / gla rtsi dang / tsandan ni bzhi mnyam dang / dmar ni tsandan dang / tsandan dmar po dang yang sbyar ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Again, blood, musk, and sandalwood are the four even [ingredients], and red is also sandalwood and red sandalwood.

original: tshogs kyi nang zhes pa ni 'khor lo gsum gyi dbus so //
analyzed: tshogs kyi nang zhes pa ni 'khor lo gsum gyi dbus so //
translated: In the midst of the assembly means in the middle of the three wheels.

original: yang na ni rnal 'byor cig 'dzin pa'i dam tshig pa tshogs pa'i nang du rab tu gnas shing rjes su gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang na ni rnal 'byor cig 'dzin pa'i dam tshig pa tshogs pa'i nang du rab tu gnas shing rjes su gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Or else, it means that the pledge being, who is the single yogin, is well-established and abiding in the midst of the assembly.

original: ni'i sgra ni gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'o //
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'o //
translated: The word ni excludes [the possibility] of anything else.

original: thams cad rdo rje mtshan ma ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i rtags ni de'i mtshan ma ste /
analyzed: thams cad rdo rje mtshan ma ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i rtags ni de'i mtshan ma ste /
translated: All vajra signs means the signs of that BhagavƒÅn Buddha.

original: yang dam tshig gi sgras padma'i snod do //
analyzed: yang dam tshig gi sgras padma'i snod do //
translated: Again, the word pledge refers to the lotus vessel.

original: dung chen po ji srid du 'dzin pa zhes pa ni rdo rje kun mtshan mtshan ma 'dzin te //
analyzed: dung chen po ji srid du 'dzin pa zhes pa ni rdo rje kun mtshan mtshan ma 'dzin te //
translated: Holding the great conch as long as one wishes means holding the sign of all vajras.

original: 'dis ni bdud rtsi lnga'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: 'dis ni bdud rtsi lnga'i khyad par ro //
translated: This is the distinction of the five nectars.

original: rdo rje mthe bong srin lag sbyar //
analyzed: rdo rje mthe bong srin lag sbyar //
translated: The vajra is the thumb and ring finger joined.

original: go cha la sogs pa bkod pas mi phyed pa'i g-yon pa'i lag pa'i mthe bong dang srin lag gnyis kyis bcad pa ni longs spyod par bya'o //
analyzed: go cha la sogs pa bkod pas mi phyed pa'i g-yon pa'i lag pa'i mthe bong dang srin lag gnyis kyis bcad pa ni longs spyod par bya'o //
translated: The enjoyment is the cutting with the thumb and ring finger of the left hand, which is placed on the armor and so forth.

original: yang na gzhung ni gzhan te /
analyzed: yang na gzhung ni gzhan te /
translated: Or, the text is different:

original: rnal 'byor rig pas zhes pa ni rtag tu sngags dang lha'i rnal 'byor 'chang ba'i sgrub pa po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rig pas zhes pa ni rtag tu sngags dang lha'i rnal 'byor 'chang ba'i sgrub pa po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The yogi, knowing, means the adept who always holds the yoga of mantra and deity.

original: zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin zhes bya ba'i don ni zhi ba'i btung ba ni chang gi btung ba bzhin du de nyid tshig tu brjod par rigs te /
analyzed: zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin zhes bya ba'i don ni zhi ba'i btung ba ni chang gi btung ba bzhin du de nyid tshig tu brjod par rigs te /
translated: Like the drink of peace means that like the drink of peace, which is the drink of beer, it is proper to speak of it with that word.

original: 'on kyang bram ze rnams @170b kyis mchod sbyin byed pa'i dus su shin tu dag byed du gyur ba'i btung ba'i khyad par can du bram ze rnams kyis 'dzin te de lta bu zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'on kyang bram ze rnams @170b kyis mchod sbyin byed pa'i dus su shin tu dag byed du gyur ba'i btung ba'i khyad par can du bram ze rnams kyis 'dzin te de lta bu zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: However, the brahmins hold it to be a special drink that becomes very purifying at the time of the sacrifice of the brahmins.

original: de la 'di'i dgongs pa ni grangs la 'das shing don mang ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de la 'di'i dgongs pa ni grangs la 'das shing don mang ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The intention here is that, since the number is exceeded and the meaning is many,

original: zhi ba'i btung ba dang 'dra bar byas nas ji ltar nus par bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dang dam tshig gi rdzes la sogs pa khyad par gzhan nga rgyal skyes pas smod pa la sogs pa yongs su spangs te /
analyzed: zhi ba'i btung ba dang 'dra bar byas nas ji ltar nus par bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dang dam tshig gi rdzes la sogs pa khyad par gzhan nga rgyal skyes pas smod pa la sogs pa yongs su spangs te /
translated: having made it like the drink of peace, whatever one is able to, one should avoid disparaging the five nectars, the pledge substances, and so on, and so forth, with the pride of the deity.

original: bdud rtsi'i btung ba lta bur yongs su brtags na rtag pa'i dngos grub 'thob ste /
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i btung ba lta bur yongs su brtags na rtag pa'i dngos grub 'thob ste /
translated: If one imagines the drink of nectar, one attains the stable spiritual powers.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'di yis kyang thob po //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'di yis kyang thob po //
translated: One also attains the spiritual powers of the great seal.

original: mchod bzhi zhes pa la /
analyzed: mchod bzhi zhes pa la /
translated: The four offerings

original: mchod bzhi ni phyi dang gsang ba dang / yid kyi rang bzhin dang de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa'o //
analyzed: mchod bzhi ni phyi dang gsang ba dang / yid kyi rang bzhin dang de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa'o //
translated: The four offerings are the outer, the secret, the mental, and the reality offerings.

original: yang na phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig dang / chos dang / las kyi phyag rgya bzhi ni mchod pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: yang na phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig dang / chos dang / las kyi phyag rgya bzhi ni mchod pa bzhi'o //
translated: Alternatively, the four offerings are the four seals: the great seal, the pledge seal, the doctrine seal, and the action seal.

original: de bzhin rnal 'byor ma zhes pa dang / dbang nyid snyoms par 'jug pa'i zhes pa ni //
analyzed: de bzhin rnal 'byor ma zhes pa dang / dbang nyid snyoms par 'jug pa'i zhes pa ni //
translated: Likewise, the yoginis, and the one who is absorbed in the power itself,

original: dbang po gnyis kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las bya ba'i khyad par ram //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las bya ba'i khyad par ram //
translated: are the special activities of the absorption of the two organs.

original: dpa' bo zhes pa dpal he ru ka la sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams de bzhin du bde ba'i tshig go //
analyzed: dpa' bo zhes pa dpal he ru ka la sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams de bzhin du bde ba'i tshig go //
translated: The hero is the heroes such as Sri Heruka, and the yoginis such as the dakinis, and so on.

original: de nyid 'dzin ni thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i rnal 'byor 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'dzin ni thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i rnal 'byor 'chang ba'o //
translated: The bearer of reality is the bearer of the yoga of the means and the means of arising.

original: yang na ni de nyid ni gzhan ma yin pa nyid dam /
analyzed: yang na ni de nyid ni gzhan ma yin pa nyid dam /
translated: Or else, reality is not other than that,

original: 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa dang lhan cig tu ro gcig pa 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa dang lhan cig tu ro gcig pa 'chang ba'o //
translated: or it is the bearer of the single taste that is simultaneous with the abiding of the three wheels.

original: lha dang mi'i bde ba bsdus la gcig tu byas pas ni rdo rje ni bcom ldan 'das te /
analyzed: lha dang mi'i bde ba bsdus la gcig tu byas pas ni rdo rje ni bcom ldan 'das te /
translated: The vajra is the Bhagavat, who is the single collection of the bliss of gods and humans.

original: de 'dzin pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi rnal 'byor ba'o //
analyzed: de 'dzin pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi rnal 'byor ba'o //
translated: The bearer of that is the yoga of Vajradhara.

original: bcu drug char yang mi phod de //
analyzed: bcu drug char yang mi phod de //
translated: Even a sixteenth part does not apply.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is saying:

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni bcu drug gi cha'i gcig cha tsam yang rnal 'byor gzhan 'chang bas mi phod mi thob pa pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni bcu drug gi cha'i gcig cha tsam yang rnal 'byor gzhan 'chang bas mi phod mi thob pa pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The yogi who is such, even a sixteenth part, is not able to be borne by another yogi, i.e., is not able to be attained.

original: yang na ni rdo rje'i cha zhes bya ba'i gzhung gzhan yang yod de don de nyid do //
analyzed: yang na ni rdo rje'i cha zhes bya ba'i gzhung gzhan yang yod de don de nyid do //
translated: Or else, there is another text, ‚Äúthe part of the vajra,‚Äù which has the same meaning.

original: lhag ma ni gsal bar byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhag ma ni gsal bar byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The rest is clear.

original: ri sul tshang tshing phug rnams sam //
analyzed: ri sul tshang tshing phug rnams sam //
translated: In a mountain cave, a thicket, a hollow,

original: zhes pa ni ri'i phug la sogs pa'i phyogs su'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni ri'i phug la sogs pa'i phyogs su'o //
translated: in a place such as a mountain cave, etc.

original: chu bo chen po'i ngogs dag tu //
analyzed: chu bo chen po'i ngogs dag tu //
translated: On the banks of a great river,

original: zhes pa ni rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram la sogs pa'o //üîΩgdod nas grub @171a * //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram la sogs pa'o // gdod nas grub @171a * //
translated: on the shore of the great ocean, etc.

original: pa'i dur khrod du //üîΩzhes pa ni //
analyzed: pa'i dur khrod du // zhes pa ni //
translated: In a charnel ground that is naturally established,

original: cig nas gcig tu mchog tu rab tu grags pa'i dur khrod du'o //üîΩder ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
analyzed: cig nas gcig tu mchog tu rab tu grags pa'i dur khrod du'o // der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
translated: in a charnel ground that is well known from one place to another.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: There one should draw the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: 'dir de lta bu la sogs pa'i gnas su 'og nas 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi dpal bde mchog 'khor lo bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dir de lta bu la sogs pa'i gnas su 'og nas 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi dpal bde mchog 'khor lo bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Here, in such places, one should draw the glorious Cakrasa·πÉvara, as will be described below.

original: dpal he ru ka'i mngon par brjod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdzogs so zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i mngon par brjod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdzogs so zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: The glorious Heruka's Tantra, called the AbhidhƒÅna, is complete.

original: dpal he ru ka brjod par bya ba'i brjod par byed pa'i gzhung gi tshogs las dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa'i le'u'i 'grel pa ste dang po'o /
analyzed: dpal he ru ka brjod par bya ba'i brjod par byed pa'i gzhung gi tshogs las dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa'i le'u'i 'grel pa ste dang po'o /
translated: The commentary on the chapter on entering the ma·πá·∏çala is the first from the collection of texts that express the glorious Heruka's expression.

original: // / de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: // / de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: There, etc.

original: rgyud la zlos pa'i skyon med pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yang ston to //
analyzed: rgyud la zlos pa'i skyon med pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yang ston to //
translated: Because there is no fault in reciting the tantra, the ma·πá·∏çala ritual is also taught.

original: bar 'di na bha ba pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yod de logs na yod do //
analyzed: bar 'di na bha ba pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yod de logs na yod do //
translated: Here in this [text], there is the ma·πá·∏çala ritual of Bhava, which exists elsewhere.

original: yang na de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: yang na de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Or, there, etc.

original: mdor bsdus na dkyil 'khor byed pa'i gnas nye bar dmigs pa nas bzung nas /
analyzed: mdor bsdus na dkyil 'khor byed pa'i gnas nye bar dmigs pa nas bzung nas /
translated: In brief, having taken up the observation of the place where the ma·πá·∏çala is made,

original: bla ma la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i bar dkyil 'khor dang dbang bskur ba ni le'u'i don to zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bla ma la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i bar dkyil 'khor dang dbang bskur ba ni le'u'i don to zhes gsungs so //
translated: The meaning of the chapter is the ma·πá·∏çala and empowerment, up to the worship and service of the guru.

original: de la zhes pa ni ri sul dang tshang tshing la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su'o //
analyzed: de la zhes pa ni ri sul dang tshang tshing la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su'o //
translated: There means in places such as mountain valleys, thickets, and so on.

original: chu dang lci ba zhes pa ni chu ru gtogs pa'i lci ba ni chu dang lci ba ste /
analyzed: chu dang lci ba zhes pa ni chu ru gtogs pa'i lci ba ni chu dang lci ba ste /
translated: Water and cow dung means that the water and cow dung are included in the water.

original: de yis dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi byug par bya'o zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: de yis dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi byug par bya'o zhes sbyar ro //
translated: One should apply that to anointing the ma·πá·∏çala base.

original: dur khrod dang chu'i ngogs dang dgon pa dang ri sul dang rdzing bu'i ngogs dang gdung yod pa'i mchod rten dang shing gcig gi drung dang tshong dus dang grong khyer dang tshong dus kyi rnam pa'i khang pa dang gar dang glu rtag tu byed pa'i gnas dang yang
analyzed: dur khrod dang chu'i ngogs dang dgon pa dang ri sul dang rdzing bu'i ngogs dang gdung yod pa'i mchod rten dang shing gcig gi drung dang tshong dus dang grong khyer dang tshong dus kyi rnam pa'i khang pa dang gar dang glu rtag tu byed pa'i gnas dang yang
translated: Cemeteries, riverbanks, forests, mountain valleys, the banks of ponds, caityas with beams, in front of solitary trees, in towns, in houses with the form of marketplaces, and in places where dance and song are always performed,

original: na ni gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang / zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang / 'dun sa dang nye ba'i 'dun sa dang / 'du ba dang nye ba'i 'du ba dang / dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod ni sa bcur gtogs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: na ni gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang / zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang / 'dun sa dang nye ba'i 'dun sa dang / 'du ba dang nye ba'i 'du ba dang / dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod ni sa bcur gtogs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The places are the ten grounds, and the neighboring places are the ten stages of action.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: dur khrod du ni kun spyod cing //
analyzed: dur khrod du ni kun spyod cing //
translated: In the charnel ground, one should practice...üîΩ This means that one should visualize the charnel ground in the form of a great charnel ground in the place where the ma·πá·∏çala is drawn, such as a stable mountain ravine or dense forest, and so on.

original: zhes pa brtan pa'i ri sul dang tshang tshing la sogs pa rnams gang du dkyil 'khor bri ba der dur khrod chen po'i rnam par bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa brtan pa'i ri sul dang tshang tshing la sogs pa rnams gang du dkyil 'khor bri ba der dur khrod chen po'i rnam par bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The charnel ground and so on refer to the charnel ground, the great charnel ground, the charnel ground of the great charnel ground, and the charnel ground of the charnel ground.

original: ro bsregs sol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ro bsregs sol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The charnel ground is the place where corpses are discarded.üîΩ The great charnel ground is the place where the corpses of those who have died are discarded.üîΩ The charnel ground of the great charnel ground is the place where the corpses of those who have died in the great charnel ground are discarded.

analyzed: rdul tshon 'du bya ba ston pa ste / lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The charnel ground of the charnel ground is the place where the corpses of those who have died in the charnel ground are discarded.üîΩThe charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel ground is the place where the corpses of those who have died in the charnel ground of the charnel ground are discarded.üîΩ The charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel ground is the place where the corpses of those who have died in the charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel ground are discarded.üîΩ The charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel ground is the place where the corpses of those who have died in the charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel ground are discarded.üîΩ The charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel ground is the place where the corpses of those who have died in the charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel ground are discarded.

original: slob dpon mtshan nyid thams cad ldan //üîΩzhes pa ni /üîΩslob dpon mtshan nyid @171b ma lus pa dang nye bar ldan pa zhes pa'i don to //üîΩyang dag shes shing zhes pa ni /
analyzed: slob dpon mtshan nyid thams cad ldan //üîΩzhes pa ni /üîΩslob dpon mtshan nyid @171b ma lus pa dang nye bar ldan pa zhes pa'i don to //üîΩyang dag shes shing zhes pa ni /
translated: The charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel ground of the charnel

original: yang dag pa khyad par can gyi ye shes kyi blo gang yin pa de ni de bzhin te nus pa skyes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang dag pa khyad par can gyi ye shes kyi blo gang yin pa de ni de bzhin te nus pa skyes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The one who has the mind of the special, perfect pristine consciousness is just so, meaning that the potential has arisen.

original: rgyud ces pa zhes pa ni rgyud ma lus pa'i don rig pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud ces pa zhes pa ni rgyud ma lus pa'i don rig pa'o //
translated: The one who knows the meaning of the continuum is the one who knows the meaning of the entire continuum.

original: yang na ni bsdu bas tshig gi don gcig nyid de /
analyzed: yang na ni bsdu bas tshig gi don gcig nyid de /
translated: Alternatively, the meaning of the words is the same, due to the inclusion.

original: yang dag pa ma lus pa'i de nyid shes pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma lus pa'i de nyid shes pa ste /
translated: The one who knows the reality of the entire perfect [nature]üîΩis the one who knows the meaning of the entire, unmistaken perfect [nature].

original: yang dag pa ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ma lus pa'i de nyid kyi don de yis shes pa la yang dag shes shing rgyud shes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩyang na ni rdo rje dang padma dang bskyod pa dang yang dag par ldan pas gsang ba'i dbang ster bar nus pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang dag pa ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ma lus pa'i de nyid kyi don de yis shes pa la yang dag shes shing rgyud shes pa zhes bya ba'i don to // yang na ni rdo rje dang padma dang bskyod pa dang yang dag par ldan pas gsang ba'i dbang ster bar nus pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The one who knows the perfect [nature] is the one who knows the continuum, meaning the one who knows the meaning of the continuum.

original: dpal ldan khrag 'thung gsang sngags shes //üîΩzhes pa ni /
analyzed: dpal ldan khrag 'thung gsang sngags shes // zhes pa ni /
translated: Alternatively, the one who is able to bestow the secret empowerment through the union of the vajra, lotus, and churning is the one who knows the mantra of glorious Heruka.

original: sngon du bsnyen pa mang du song ba'o //
analyzed: sngon du bsnyen pa mang du song ba'o //
translated: The one who has performed the prior approximation many times.

original: khro ba med pa zhes pa ni khro ba la sogs pa yang dag par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khro ba med pa zhes pa ni khro ba la sogs pa yang dag par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The absence of anger means the complete abandonment of anger and so forth.

original: gtsang zhing zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i gtsang sbra yongs su skyong ba po zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gtsang zhing zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i gtsang sbra yongs su skyong ba po zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Pure means the one who maintains the purity that will be described below.

original: mkhas pa ni snyom las med pa'o //
analyzed: mkhas pa ni snyom las med pa'o //
translated: The wise one is the one who is not lazy.

original: sbyor shes ye shes pha rol 'gro //
analyzed: sbyor shes ye shes pha rol 'gro //
translated: The one who knows union is the one who has gone to the other side of gnosis.

original: zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab la sogs pa yang dag pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid de nyid kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab la sogs pa yang dag pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid de nyid kyi ye shes te /
translated: This means that the nature of the true Dharma is method and wisdom and so forth.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid kyi pha rol tu 'gro ba ni skad cig la mngon du byed ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid kyi pha rol tu 'gro ba ni skad cig la mngon du byed ces pa'i don to //
translated: The one who has gone to the other side of that gnosis is the one who actualizes it in an instant.

original: thod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: thod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Skull and so forth.

original: yan lag tu byas pa'i rtags bsdus pa gang yin pas khyad par du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rig pas phyag rgya chen po ston te /
analyzed: yan lag tu byas pa'i rtags bsdus pa gang yin pas khyad par du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rig pas phyag rgya chen po ston te /
translated: The one who is distinguished by the collection of the signs that are made into limbs is the one who is taught to be the great seal.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: dum gcig spyi bor brgyan pa dang // zhes pa ni /
analyzed: dum gcig spyi bor brgyan pa dang // zhes pa ni /
translated: The one who is adorned with a single tuft on the crown of the head.

original: 'dis ni dpral ba'i steng gi thod pa'i phreng ba btags pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni dpral ba'i steng gi thod pa'i phreng ba btags pa'o //
translated: This shows the garland of skulls placed on the forehead.

original: yang na ni dum bu mang po'i padma'i snod kyang bstan no //
analyzed: yang na ni dum bu mang po'i padma'i snod kyang bstan no //
translated: Or else, it shows the lotus vessel with many pieces.

original: rgyud thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa lugs las bzlog pa dang lugs su 'byung ba'i sbyor bas bstan pa bla ma'i man ngag gis go rims bzhin du blo dang ldan pas yongs su rdzogs par bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyud thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa lugs las bzlog pa dang lugs su 'byung ba'i sbyor bas bstan pa bla ma'i man ngag gis go rims bzhin du blo dang ldan pas yongs su rdzogs par bshad par bya'o //
translated: The characteristics of the great seal of all tantras and so forth, in forward and reverse sequences, should be fully explained by the wise in order, according to the guru's instructions, with the application of the teachings.

original: rus pa'i phreng ba rnam par 'phyang //
analyzed: rus pa'i phreng ba rnam par 'phyang //
translated: The garland of bones hangs down.

original: zhes bya ba 'dis ni rus pa'i phreng ba ni brgya phyed pa'i thod pa'i phreng bas yi ge lnga bcu'i ngo bo nyid 'phyang ba ste thod pa'i phreng ba zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis ni rus pa'i phreng ba ni brgya phyed pa'i thod pa'i phreng bas yi ge lnga bcu'i ngo bo nyid 'phyang ba ste thod pa'i phreng ba zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This shows the garland of bones, the garland of skulls of the fifty letters, which hangs down, with the meaning of the garland of skulls.

original: kha tv'am ga ni lag na gnas //üîΩzhes pa ni kha tv'am @172a * //
analyzed: kha tv'am ga ni lag na gnas // zhes pa ni kha tv'am @172a * //
translated: The kha·π≠vƒÅ·πÖga is in the hand.

original: ga lag na gnas pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin te /
analyzed: ga lag na gnas pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin te /
translated: The kha·π≠vƒÅ·πÖga that is in the hand is just that.

original: de nyid kyi phyir //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir //
translated: For that very reason,

original: bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas //
analyzed: bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas //
translated: having made oneself Heruka,

original: zhes brjod do //
analyzed: zhes brjod do //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: dpal he ru ka dran par bya //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka dran par bya //
translated: One should recollect the glorious Heruka.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This means

original: dkyil 'khor la bkod pa'i dpal he ru ka'i gzugs nyid la spyad par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor la bkod pa'i dpal he ru ka'i gzugs nyid la spyad par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: one should enjoy the very form of the glorious Heruka arranged in the mandala.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /üîΩ'khor lo 'di yi snying gar dgong //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / 'khor lo 'di yi snying gar dgong //
translated: For this very reason,

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: one should visualize it in the heart of this wheel.

original: 'khor lo zhes pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi don la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir 'khor lo bri bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'khor lo zhes pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi don la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir 'khor lo bri bar bya ba ste /
translated: The wheel is to be drawn because it has the nature of following the meaning of the holy Dharma, and so on.

original: 'khor lo 'di yis bri bar bya ba'am 'khor lo 'di ni 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: 'khor lo 'di yis bri bar bya ba'am 'khor lo 'di ni 'khor lo ste /
translated: This wheel is to be drawn, or this wheel is a wheel.

original: dpal he ru ka dang bcas pa'i 'og nas 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor snying ga'i dbus su dgod par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka dang bcas pa'i 'og nas 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor snying ga'i dbus su dgod par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The mandala that will be explained below, together with the glorious Heruka, should be visualized in the center of the heart. This is the meaning.

original: de ltar bdag nyid go bgos nas //
analyzed: de ltar bdag nyid go bgos nas //
translated: Thus, having armored oneself,

original: ra ba rnams ni phyogs su dgod //
analyzed: ra ba rnams ni phyogs su dgod //
translated: one should visualize the ramparts in the directions.

original: ces pa la /
analyzed: ces pa la /
translated: Here,

original: rang gi lus la go bgo bar bya ste /
analyzed: rang gi lus la go bgo bar bya ste /
translated: one should armor one's body.

original: a'a li dang k'a li dam tshig brjod pa'i rjes su zhe sdang dang 'dod chags dang gti mug gi ra ba dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: a'a li dang k'a li dam tshig brjod pa'i rjes su zhe sdang dang 'dod chags dang gti mug gi ra ba dgod par bya'o //
translated: After the expression of the pledge, one should set out the enclosures of hatred, passion, and folly.

original: gzhal yas khang la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dus su rdo rje'i ra ba dang padma'i ra ba dang / 'khor lo'i ra ba dgod par bya'o zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: gzhal yas khang la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dus su rdo rje'i ra ba dang padma'i ra ba dang / 'khor lo'i ra ba dgod par bya'o zhes dgongs so //
translated: When the celestial palace, etc., are completely finished, one should set out the enclosure of vajras, the enclosure of lotuses, and the enclosure of wheels.

original: de ltar bdag nyid go bgos nas //
analyzed: de ltar bdag nyid go bgos nas //
translated: Thus, having armored oneself,

original: 'og tu mtshon cha dgod par bya //
analyzed: 'og tu mtshon cha dgod par bya //
translated: one should set out the weapons below.

original: zhes pa ni 'og gi mthar thug par rdo rje'i sa gzhi brtag par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'og gi mthar thug par rdo rje'i sa gzhi brtag par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This means that one should imagine the vajra ground extending to the bottom.

original: 'khor lo bdag nyid mtshon cha rnams //
analyzed: 'khor lo bdag nyid mtshon cha rnams //
translated: The weapons, the wheels,

original: steng du mda'i dra ba zhes pa ni /
analyzed: steng du mda'i dra ba zhes pa ni /
translated: the net of arrows above.

original: mda'i dra ba ni rdo rje'i gur steng du dgod par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mda'i dra ba ni rdo rje'i gur steng du dgod par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The net of arrows is the vajra tent, which should be set out above.

original: yang bdag nyid ces pa ni /
analyzed: yang bdag nyid ces pa ni /
translated: Again, oneself.

original: ye shes sems dpa' 'jug pa'i dus su gzhal yas khang gi nang du byas nas ra ba la sogs pa nye bar brtag par bya'o zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' 'jug pa'i dus su gzhal yas khang gi nang du byas nas ra ba la sogs pa nye bar brtag par bya'o zhes dgongs so //
translated: At the time of entering the gnosis being, one should imagine the celestial mansion inside the protection wheel, and so forth.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sngags pas dkyil 'khor 'dri ba la 'jigs pa med par bstan to //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sngags pas dkyil 'khor 'dri ba la 'jigs pa med par bstan to //
translated: Thus, and so on, the mantra practitioner is taught to be fearless in drawing the mandala.

original: sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam brgyan nas //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam brgyan nas //
translated: Adorned with mantra and mudra,

original: zhes pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la /
translated: means

original: legs par bslabs pa'i phyi rol gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: legs par bslabs pa'i phyi rol gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: endowed with an external mudra who is well trained.

original: bri bar bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: bri bar bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Draw, and so on, is easy to understand.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi thig skud ston te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi thig skud ston te /
translated: Then, and so on, shows the mandala string.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: mdangs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid rgyas par byed de /
analyzed: mdangs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid rgyas par byed de /
translated: Radiance, and so on, elaborates on the characteristics of the great mudra.

original: mdangs @172b dang gzi brjid de rab tu 'bar ba zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mdangs @172b dang gzi brjid de rab tu 'bar ba zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Radiance and splendor means blazing.

original: lhag ma ni ji lta ba'i don nyid do //
analyzed: lhag ma ni ji lta ba'i don nyid do //
translated: The rest is just as it is.

original: smin ma bzang po rdo rje 'byes //
analyzed: smin ma bzang po rdo rje 'byes //
translated: The eyebrows are excellent, and the vajra is split.

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje lta bur yang dag bye ba'i thun mong du smin ma gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje lta bu'i smin ma 'byes zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje lta bur yang dag bye ba'i thun mong du smin ma gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje lta bu'i smin ma 'byes zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This means that the eyebrows are split, which are common to the vajra-like.

original: yang na ni dpral ba'i steng du rdo rje'i phreng ba'i mthar smin ma yod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang na ni dpral ba'i steng du rdo rje'i phreng ba'i mthar smin ma yod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Or, it means that the eyebrows are at the end of the vajra garland on the forehead.

original: lhag ma ni rtogs sla zhing gsungs pa'i don nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: lhag ma ni rtogs sla zhing gsungs pa'i don nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The rest is easy to understand and has the meaning that is stated.

original: de la 'khyud pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lha mo rdo rje phag mo shin tu mi bzad par gsal bar byed do //üîΩrab 'jigs 'jigs byed che la phyogs //
analyzed: de la 'khyud pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lha mo rdo rje phag mo shin tu mi bzad par gsal bar byed do // rab 'jigs 'jigs byed che la phyogs //
translated: There, with ‚Äúembracing‚Äù and so forth, he clarifies the goddess Vajravarahi.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: Facing the great, terrifying Bhairava.

original: kha cig na re dbang phyug chen po la mngon par phyogs pa'o zer te de ni 'dir rjes su mthun pa ma yin te gnas skabs ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kha cig na re dbang phyug chen po la mngon par phyogs pa'o zer te de ni 'dir rjes su mthun pa ma yin te gnas skabs ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Some say that this means facing Mahesvara, but that is not appropriate here because it is not the context.

original: rdo rje phag mo'i phyag rgya chen po ston pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo'i phyag rgya chen po ston pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the context for teaching the great seal of Vajravarahi.

original: de la 'di'i don ni 'jigs byed chen po ni bcom ldan 'das te /
analyzed: de la 'di'i don ni 'jigs byed chen po ni bcom ldan 'das te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows: The Great Bhairava is the Lord.

original: de la mngon du phyogs pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: de la mngon du phyogs pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis 'khyud pa'o //
translated: Facing him means embracing him with body, speech, and mind.

original: la'i sgras ni de nyid kyi don nges par gzung ba'o //
analyzed: la'i sgras ni de nyid kyi don nges par gzung ba'o //
translated: The word only means that he is to be embraced by those alone.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: de la bum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
analyzed: de la bum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
translated: There, pot, etc.

original: bum pa'i mtshan nyid phyogs gcig nye bar mtshon pa tsam ston te /
analyzed: bum pa'i mtshan nyid phyogs gcig nye bar mtshon pa tsam ston te /
translated: indicate the mere indication of one part of the definition of a pot.

analyzed: nag po med pa dang lto ba che zhing 'phyang ba dang ske ring ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It has the definition of being without blackness, having a large, hanging belly, a long neck, etc.

original: mu tig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni rin po che sna lnga ston pa'o //
analyzed: mu tig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni rin po che sna lnga ston pa'o //
translated: Pearl, etc. indicate the five precious substances.

original: zangs ma zhes pa ni bum pa la sogs pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: zangs ma zhes pa ni bum pa la sogs pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: Copper is a particular kind of pot, etc.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: ma rnyed na bum pa dgu'o //
analyzed: ma rnyed na bum pa dgu'o //
translated: If one cannot find them, there are nine pots.

original: rnyed na bum pa nyi shu rtsa lnga dang la'am  la sogs pa'i bum pa bzhi dang khva gdong ma la sogs pa'i bum pa brgyad dang las thams cad pa dang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'o //
analyzed: rnyed na bum pa nyi shu rtsa lnga dang la'am  la sogs pa'i bum pa bzhi dang khva gdong ma la sogs pa'i bum pa brgyad dang las thams cad pa dang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'o //
translated: If one can afford it, there are twenty-five vases, four vases for the four goddesses beginning with LƒÅmƒÅ, eight vases for the eight goddesses beginning with KƒÅkƒÅsyƒÅ, and the all-activity vase and the victory vase.

original: yang na bsdus na ni bzhi bcu tham pa yin no //
analyzed: yang na bsdus na ni bzhi bcu tham pa yin no //
translated: Or, if one cannot afford that many, there are forty.

original: lhag ma ni gsal lo //
analyzed: lhag ma ni gsal lo //
translated: The rest is clear.

original: brgyan par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: brgyan par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
translated: As for ‚Äúadorn,‚Äù etc.

analyzed: ji ltar rnyed pa'i rin po ches dkyil 'khor la ji ltar mdzes par dgram par bya'o zhes 'di'i don to //
translated: One should arrange the ma·πá·∏çala with whatever jewels one can afford, as is pleasing. This is the meaning here.

original: grong mchog yid 'ong mchod gnas ni //
analyzed: grong mchog yid 'ong mchod gnas ni //
translated: In the supreme, delightful town, the place of worship,

original: 'grub pa nyid du the tshom med //
analyzed: 'grub pa nyid du the tshom med //
translated: there is no doubt that one will attain.

original: ces pa ni go sla'o //üîΩbdag nyid kun nas sgo yis ni //
analyzed: ces pa ni go sla'o // bdag nyid kun nas sgo yis ni //
translated: This is easy to understand.

original: dri yi chu yis legs par gdab //
analyzed: dri yi chu yis legs par gdab //
translated: One should sprinkle with scented waterüîΩfrom all around.

original: ces pa ni @173a * //
analyzed: ces pa ni @173a * //
translated: This means

analyzed: sngags kyis gtsang bar byas pa'i dri dang bcas pa gtor ba ste /
translated: one should sprinkle with scented water consecrated with the mantra.

analyzed: rdo rje'i chus yang dag par gtor ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should sprinkle with vajra water.

original: bdag nyid kun nas sgo yis ni //
analyzed: bdag nyid kun nas sgo yis ni //
translated: One should visualize the entire self,

original: zhes bya ba khyad par du byed de //
analyzed: zhes bya ba khyad par du byed de //
translated: is the specification.

original: dpal he ru ka'i bdag nyid gang yin pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal bzhi nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i bdag nyid gang yin pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal bzhi nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: gzhan na sgron ma lnga gang yin pas rnga mo dang rta la sogs pa'i sha yang gzung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: sems ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the mind has the nature of moving in the sky.

original: sa steng mkha' 'gro ma gang yin //
analyzed: sa steng mkha' 'gro ma gang yin //
translated: Those who are sky-farers on the earth,

analyzed: dkyil 'khor kun du dgod par bya /
translated: one should place them in all the ma·πá·∏çalas.

original: zhes pa ni thams cad du dkyil 'khor la thams cad kyis sam /
analyzed: zhes pa ni thams cad du dkyil 'khor la thams cad kyis sam /
translated: This is the arrangement of the entire mandala everywhere, or

analyzed: sa steng gi 'khor lo gang ba de la spyod pa yang dgod par bya ba ste /
translated: the arrangement of the wheel on the earth, which is to be enjoyed.

original: gsung gi 'khor lo ni dbus su gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gsung gi 'khor lo ni dbus su gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the wheel of speech is located in the center.

original: gang yang sa 'og mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: gang yang sa 'og mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: The dakinis of the underworld

original: de ni sa 'og rnams su dgod //
analyzed: de ni sa 'og rnams su dgod //
translated: are to be arranged in the underworlds.

original: ces pa ni sa 'og na gnas pa yang stobs kyis sku'i 'khor lo dgod par bya zhes rtogs par bya'o //üîΩma mo thams cad phyogs dang ni //
analyzed: ces pa ni sa 'og na gnas pa yang stobs kyis sku'i 'khor lo dgod par bya zhes rtogs par bya'o // ma mo thams cad phyogs dang ni //

original: phyogs mtshams rnams su dgod par bya //
analyzed: phyogs mtshams rnams su dgod par bya //
translated: and the intermediate directions.

original: zhes pa ni khra gdong ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma brgyad dgod par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni khra gdong ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma brgyad dgod par bstan pa'o //
translated: This teaches the arrangement of the eight yoginis beginning with Khadyota.

original: dri dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mchod pa rnam pa lnga'i cho ga ston to //
analyzed: dri dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mchod pa rnam pa lnga'i cho ga ston to //
translated: The rite of the five offerings is taught by ‚Äúincense‚Äù and so forth.

original: mar me brgya yang dbul bya zhing //
analyzed: mar me brgya yang dbul bya zhing //
translated: One should also offer a hundred lamps,

original: zhes pa ni sngon du bstan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sngon du bstan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
